org.vertx.java.core.impl

Class VertxInternal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.core.Vertx
      • org.vertx.java.core.impl.VertxInternal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultVertx

    public abstract class VertxInternal
extends Vertx
    This class provides services for vert.x core internal use only It is not part of the public API and should not be used by developers creating vert.x applications
